com.digitalpebble.stormcrawler.protocol

Interface HttpHeaders


  • public interface HttpHeaders
    A collection of HTTP header names and utilities around header values.
    See Also:
    Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1 (RFC 2616)

    • Field Summary

      • HTTP_DATE_FORMATTER

        static final java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter HTTP_DATE_FORMATTER
        Formatter for dates in HTTP headers, used to fill the "If-Modified-Since" request header field, e.g. 
         Sun, 06 Nov 1994 08:49:37 GMT
        See sec. 3.3.1 in RFC 2616 and sec. 7.1.1.1 in RFC 7231. The latter specifies the format defined in RFC 1123 as the "preferred" format.

    • Method Detail

      • formatHttpDate

        static String formatHttpDate(String isoDate)
        Format an ISO date string as HTTP date used in HTTP headers, e.g., 
         1994-11-06T08:49:37.000Z
        is formatted to 
         Sun, 06 Nov 1994 08:49:37 GMT
        See #HTTP_DATE_FORMATTER.
